Ordering Options For Customized Program Management

We offer many different ways for you or your employees to pay for their safety shoes.

For qualifying customers, we offer our extremely convenient and efficient iPad Kiosk. Your employees will find Ordering Safety Footwear to be quick and easy.

  • 24/7/365 access
  • User-friendly
  • Fast ordering process
  • And much more >>>

Utlizing our Data Exchange integration will allow you greater control over your safety footwear program by:

  • Increasing your system security
  • Effeciently managing employee data
  • Determining employee eligibility
  • And much more >>>

Our CustomFit Voucher Program is an innovative solution that allows you to:

  • Lock down purchasing to only eligible employees
  • Provide employees with necessary information and security to order on their own
  • Have peace of mind knowing your employees' safety is being addressed.
  • Learn more >>>

Streamline your ordering time with Multi-Employee Ordering. It's a one-time order for all employees.

  • Fill out one order form for all of your employees
  • Receive one detailed statement of entire order for efficient and organized record keeping

For your convenience and ease, we have several payment options from which to choose. We have the experience and know-how to implement your Subsidy Program to avoid hassle and confusion during invoicing and payment. We can also incorporate a Payroll Deduction Plan with any remaining balance. We'll customize to your company's distinctive payment methods or specific subsidy allotment. All options include:

  • Credit Card Only
  • Payroll Deduction
  • Specific Percentage Up To A Dollar Amount
  • Dollar Subsidy
  • Percentage Subsidy
  • 100% Invoice

  • 100% FREE
